summary: The diff implements all three requirements. REQ-1 is addressed in SummaryCards.tsx by excluding partially-supplied RB pending rows (via originalOrderId linkage), deduplicating RB rows by orderNo, and showing an 'N RB Pending' amber indicator. REQ-2 is addressed by the same SummaryCards logic restoring totals when the Ready fragment is removed (return-to-pending). REQ-3 is addressed in TotalOrdersTab.tsx via the consolidateRBOrders function that merges pending RB fragments by orderNo into a single row before display and before the SuppliedQtyDialog is shown. All changes are data/state level only with no UI/workflow/structural changes.

hallucinated_features.description: AgeingStock page and sidebar navigation item added
hallucinated_features.reason: The build request only asks for fixes to RB partial supply calculation and consolidation logic. Adding an entirely new AgeingStock page with age-band logic, design groups, and a new sidebar route was not requested.
